entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 60 percent chance of flurries later this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 16 March 2023
